summary: A standalone custom follower with a Samurai inspired background and a new hairstyle for Reonhato and male players made by Vie101010 used with permission of course. No facepaint version now included!
descriptionHtml:
[size=6]MOD IS PROVIDED AS IS[/size]

Facepaint and No Facepaint versions included. You can also use both simultaneously.

Standalone hair mod with this hairstyle and more can be found here: http://viecustommodskyrim.blogspot.ie/

Required files: Skyrim and Latest update

Recommended mods:

Blades Samurai Armour and Kimonos by Prime http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/24704/?

(NSFW) Better males - Beautiful nudes and faces - New hairstyles by Chris57 and FavoredSoul http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/2488/?

Please report any and all bugs with this mod if any.
author: Mercer Leonhart
